originalText.text: I am just thrilled with the results I received from my facial injections! I‚Äôve inquired with several practitioners how to resolve the area around my eyes. No one could do it. Barbara was able to fix the area by 85%!! That‚Äôs a big deal!! Super knowledgeable and very skilled. Great operation!!!!

originalText.text:
If you, like me, believe in maintenance and enhancement, but you don't want to look like a cross between a  chipmunk üêøÔ∏è and a very frozen Barbie, this is the place for you. All here, Laurie, Lauren, the esthetician, and Dr. Phillip, are awesome professionals, and terrific injectors. They all err on the side of caution, and the less is more approach is a concept they adhere to. I tweak this and that about once a year, and I never left here looking like a Wax Museum figure. Btw, this is a friendly place for all and if you are a GUY LOOKING but don't know where to go, trust me when I say,  this place is  IT!

A special shout out to Laurie whom I observed one day when I was waiting here for a very late Dr. Phillip. All she did that day was face contouring.  She does THE BEST CHEEK WORK IN TOWN and you can take that to the bank! Trust her eyes.  Her hands are like clouds.

The concierge couldn't be friendlier and more accommodating.
P.S. I know I'll kick myself for leaving this review, ‚Äòcause it's already hard getting an appointment. GO!üòóüòô

originalText.text: I can't say enough about how much I love Laurie. She is a true artist and a genuinely lovely human. I no longer live in Manhattan but she is the person I miss the most. I HIGHLY recommend her and have yet to find the same level of service and attention to detail. She's the best!

text.text: I can't say enough about how much I love Laurie. She is a true artist and a genuinely lovely human. I no longer live in Manhattan but she is the person I miss the most. I HIGHLY recommend her and have yet to find the same level of service and attention to detail. She's the best!

originalText.text: Great staff! Always friendly and professional.  And Dr P is the best in this field. Precise, light handed, amazing attitude. I was recommended to him many yrs ago and recommend his to everyone who asks about my botox.  I never look ‚Äòdone‚Äô, just refreshed.

text.text: Great staff! Always friendly and professional.  And Dr P is the best in this field. Precise, light handed, amazing attitude. I was recommended to him many yrs ago and recommend his to everyone who asks about my botox.  I never look ‚Äòdone‚Äô, just refreshed.

originalText.text: Services have always been fine. Scheduling and front desk staff are awful. The last time I was at the facility, the staff texted me my appointment was running 20 minutes late, and I replied that my schedule was very tight because I needed to catch a train and asked if it was better to reschedule to another day. I informed them I was recovering from a broken leg and had trouble walking.They insisted my appointment would be just a few minutes late. So I sat there and waited for another 20 minutes, then watched someone go in ahead of me. I left because I had childcare pickup.  But here's the issue- the front desk was condescending towards me when I questioned why the person who came after me went in before me. The receptionist insisted she was in the right because she "told" me they were running late. It would have been simple enough to reschedule- I gave every indication, and she refused. Then the receptionist insisted on texting me back and forth that she was "right". OMG. I waited 40 minutes, missed my train, had to find a friend to get my kid. Then I had to deal with someone loser whose idea of customer service is insulting and talking down to paying clients? Hell no. Will never spend a dime at Rejuvenation again, no matter the quality and care of their providers.
